name: Human-markup
body:
## Structure
### Headers
* \n(\n)<=6 words\n
* A line followed up by a bunch of "---" or "___" or "==="

### New Line
* \n => <br />

### Paragraphs
* \n\n => <p>...</p>

### Quotes
* One or more sentences surrounded with ' or "
* Sentence after a ":"

### Blockquotes
* A paragraph sorrounded with ' or "

### Horizontal rules
* more than one "-" or "_" for example ---- or ____

### Lists
* An unordered List begins with * or -
* An ordered Lists with 1/2/3 or 1./2./3.

### Tables

## Rich objects
### Links

### Images

### Embeds

## Style
### Code

### Bold
* CAPSLOCK
* Sentences with an "!" as punktation!

### Italic

### Underlined

### Special Characters
